head.p: from: c.erdoes@web.de to: anna.tssio@canada.com subject: spending a year in Germany Berlin

p.s: I remember that you said, that you are thinking about spending a year in Germany after school and it has been told you that Berlin is the place to be.
So I came accrossacross this very interesting article about Berlin and thought I can tell you about it.

The article Berlin spricht Englisch by Marina Kormbaki and published in the Hannoversche Allgemeine Zeitung at 15 July 2016 is about Berlin the capital of Germany and what it makes attractive especially for English speakingEnglish-speaking people.
Berlin is a metropolis like London, Brooklyn and Sydney.
It has ana very interesting culture and night life, but also a lot of very fascinating art.
Moreover it is cheaper than a lot of other metropolis like Berlin, so it is practicable to go there after school for one year.
Because of this also a lot of people come to Germany especially Berlin, to make their dreams come true, because it's much cheaper thenthan for example in Dublin.
There are also a lot of positives especially for English speakingEnglish-speaking people.
First there are lot of English speakingEnglish-speaking people in Berlin, so sometimes you don't hear any German word for a long time.
Moreover Berlin is very multicultural and a lot of different people are living there together.
You can also find a job easier when speaking English thenthan in other German cityscities, because a lot of multicultural people are working in Berlin.
I hope that I could help you with your decision.
Let me know if you come to Germany (Berlin) then we maybe can meet in real life.
